main event: Multiple witnesses observed up to 12 round white objects flying in the sky over Cotati, California on August 16, 1952.
interesting points: The objects appeared one at a time, traveling at the same speed and then changing direction slightly, One object sat still for 5 minutes before moving again, The objects were described as looking like white ping pong balls at great height, Observers noted that the objects were solid and emitted no sound, Witnesses in various parts of Santa Rosa reported seeing the same phenomenon.
witness description: Ground observers located at GOC Post in Santa Rosa, California.
